name: Rube Goldberg Machine (ireneyang)
description:
Irene Yang

Reference: 


Concept: 

Following the related videos and Unity tutorials about physics on Youtube, I created a little joyful and cute space in the virtual universe. Because there's no coding in this project, everything is expected to look natural and real. I try to use glass, plastic, neon material and the malposed of the object and the pattern to make everything looks surreal and absurd in this universe environment. 

Problems:

1. The play mode is in slow motion but it was normal. 

(it may because there are some complex meshes which slow the speed of rendering)

2. How to do the physics of seesaw?

3. Some irregular objects don't have suitable collider

(edit in Blender)
